about_the_game:
The Boeing-Vertol CH-47 Chinook™ is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Boasting top speeds of 170 knots (196 mph, 315 km/h), the Chinook ™ was faster than contemporary utility and attack helicopters when it was introduced in the 1960s. It is one of the few aircraft of that era such as the C-130 and the UH-1 'Huey' that is still in front line service with over 1,179 built so far. Its primary roles include troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.

Virtavia’s FSX: Steam Edition of the Chinook is a faithful reproduction of the aircraft featuring various animations, authentic flight dynamics, and high res gauges. A great aircraft for helio fans and military aviation fans alike!

Note: this aircraft does not feature a 2D panel.

Features


  • 26 -page PDF illustrated user manual in .pdf format
  • 2-engine control
  • Authentic virtual cockpit with animations and clickable controls
  • Hi-res gauges with many custom system functions and switches
  • Rear cabin area included in VC
  • Separate gauge/cabin night lighting in VC
  • Animated side entry door and 3-position rear ramp assembly
  • Togglable realistic pilot figures
  • Additional animated soldier figures in US version
  • High quality TSS soundset included
  • Researched and authentic flight dynamics
  • Multiple internal and external viewpoints

The Boeing-Vertol CH-47 Chinook™ is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Boasting top speeds of 170 knots (196 mph, 315 km/h), the Chinook ™ was faster than contemporary utility and attack helicopters when it was introduced in the 1960s. It is one of the few aircraft of that era such as the C-130 and the UH-1 'Huey' that is still in front line service with over 1,179 built so far. Its primary roles include troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.

Virtavia’s FSX: Steam Edition of the Chinook is a faithful reproduction of the aircraft featuring various animations, authentic flight dynamics, and high res gauges. A great aircraft for helio fans and military aviation fans alike!

Note: this aircraft does not feature a 2D panel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features
